service_description.description: Remote dental evaluations and re-evaluations conducted via secure or permitted electronic communication technologies.

modalities: Photo or video transmission via patient smartphone

purpose_of_service.description: Problem-focused evaluation to assess oral health concerns and determine the need for in-office treatment.

limitations_of_virtual_care.description: Remote evaluations may not reveal conditions that would be discovered during in-office examination or specialized teledentistry technology.

privacy_and_confidentiality.description: Dental office will make reasonable efforts to protect patient information, but electronic communication carries inherent privacy risks.

hipaa_disclosure.description: Temporary relaxation of HIPAA enforcement during the COVID-19 public health emergency for good-faith provision of telehealth services.

risk_acknowledgement.description: Patient acknowledges increased confidentiality risk associated with non-encrypted electronic communications.

insurance_and_billing.description: Dental plans may reimburse for remote evaluations; claims may be submitted to insurance providers.

consent_duration.description: Consent remains effective until HIPAA enforcement suspension is rescinded by the government.

patient_acknowledgement.description: Patient affirms understanding of telehealth risks, limitations, and terms.
